data.description: List of data to be plotted as character values specifyingmultiple bigwig file paths, dataframes in BED format, or\link[GenomicRanges]{GRanges} objects with metadata column \code{score}

chrom.description: Chromosome of data region ragne as a string, if range for aspecific chromosome is desired

chromstart.description: Integer start position on chromosome to get data range

chromend.description: Integer end position on chromosome to get data range

assembly.description: Default genome assembly as a string or a\link[plotgardener]{assembly} object

negData.description: A logical value indicating whether any of the data has bothpositive and negative scores and the signal range should be adjustedaccordingly
